title: Maktoum bin Rashid Al Maktoum Stadium
text: Maktoum bin Rashid Al Maktoum Stadium () is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Dubai">Dubai</a>, <a href="United%20Arab%20Emirates">United Arab Emirates</a>. It was named after Sheikh <a href="Maktoum%20bin%20Rashid%20Al%20Maktoum">Maktoum bin Rashid Al Maktoum</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="Association%20football">football</a> matches and serves as the home stadium of former home <a href="Al%20Shabab%20Al%20Arabi%20Club%20Dubai">Al Shabab Al Arabi Club</a> of the <a href="UAE%20Pro%20League">UAE Pro League</a>, but after Al Shabab merged with Al Ahli and <a href="Dubai%20CSC">Dubai</a> to form <a href="Shabab%20Al-Ahli%20Club">Shabab Al-Ahli Club</a>, it became a secondary stadium to Shabab Al Ahli. The stadium holds 12,000 spectators.
